pageContent: Purpose: A randomized phase II study was performed to measure the potential therapeutic effects of yoga on fatigue, erectile dysfunction, urinary incontinence, and overall quality of life (QOL) in prostate cancer (PCa) patients undergoing external beam radiation therapy (RT).

metaData.source:
Everyday life after a radical prostatectomy - A qualitative study of men under 65 years of age
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29031306/
